welcome_message_body: Welcome to Grottaferrata, a charming city known for its historic monasteries and delicious food. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer. Buon viaggio!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, mainly serving low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
